contentrichtext.text: {{No footnotes|date=April 2009}} '''Xifeng''' ({{zh|c=息烽|p=Xīfēng}}) is a county with 250,000 inhabitants in the [[Guiyang]] [[Prefecture (China)|Prefecture]] of [[Guizhou]] [[Province (China)|Province]] of the [[People's Republic of China]]. Xifeng is one of the poorest cities in the province. The production of [[pesticide]]s is an important industry. Xifeng has belonged to the prefecture of [[Guiyang]] since 1996. Xifeng has an area of 1,037 km². The seat of the county is Yongjing(永靖镇). == Transportation == *[[China National Highway 210]] ==External links== * {{zh icon}} [http://www.gz.xinhuanet.com/zfpd/gys/xf/contents/xingai.htm Introductions of Xifeng by xinhuanet 1 ], [http://www.gz.xinhuanet.com/zfpd/gys/xf/contents/xingai-2.htm 2], [http://www.gz.xinhuanet.com/zfpd/gys/xf/contents/xingai-3.htm 3] {{county-level divisions of Guizhou}} {{coord|27|08|N|106|40|E|region:CN_type:city|display=title}} [[Category:County-level divisions of Guizhou]] {{Guizhou-geo-stub}}
